sections.title: Web Development Pricing
sections.description: Standard websites, landing pages, and web applications.

overview.desc: Tiny preview or audit to build trust (no heavy work, no custom hosting).
Very small, well-defined task (1–2 hours max).
Small deliverable (single-page or small fix pack).
Light multi-page site or several changes.
Full small-business website or advanced fix pack.
More polished, feature-rich build with some backend.
Complete small business / startup site with basic SaaS-style features.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: 1 simple wireframe or Figma-style mockup of the landing page (no full implementation).
1 static HTML/CSS page with your logo, heading, and basic content.
Fully responsive landing page (desktop + mobile) with basic animations and contact button.
Landing page with contact form, basic on-page SEO (meta tags, titles, descriptions) and Google Maps embed.
Landing page with hero section, features section, testimonials, and integrated contact form with email delivery.
Conversion-optimized landing page: responsive design, animations, SEO basics, performance optimizations.
Premium landing experience: A/B-ready structure, analytics integration, basic copy improvements, deployment and 1 month of minor edits.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Simple homepage layout suggestion or theme recommendation.
Basic 2–3 section HTML portfolio page (about, work summary, contact link).
3–5 page personal site (about, projects, contact, skills, home) – static.
Add simple blog page layout or projects gallery with filters.
Portfolio with basic CMS (e.g., markdown/JSON-based) for adding projects.
Polished portfolio with animations, custom design touches, SEO, and contact form.
Full personal brand website: portfolio, blog, newsletter signup, analytics and deployment setup.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Blog structure suggestion + 3 post ideas.
Basic blog layout with list of posts (static data).
Blog with real posts from markdown/JSON (up to 5 initial posts).
Search and category tags plus improved responsive design.
SEO-oriented blog setup: meta tags, sitemap, performance tweaks.
Blog with simple CMS/integration (e.g., headless CMS or flat-file) plus backup instructions.
Full blog platform: CMS integration, basic admin, analytics, and 1 month of bugfix support.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Product list wireframe and suggestions for structure.
Static product list page showing up to 5 products (no payment).
Product listing with cart UI (front-end only, no real checkout).
Simple checkout simulation or basic integration with one payment provider (front-end test mode).
Small e‑com MVP: product pages, cart, simple checkout workflow (test mode / cash-on-delivery).
Polished e‑com mini-site with discount codes, order confirmation emails (where possible), mobile optimization.
Small store solution: inventory basics, admin panel (simple), analytics events and deployment.

extras: API backend for simple CRUD (users, items, orders).
SEO audit and basic on-page optimization.

overview.desc: Small prototype screen, UI concept, or app idea review.
Tiny feature or 1–2 simple screens.
Small MVP or limited-feature app.
Simple functional app usable in real life.
More complete app with navigation and local storage/API.
Polished app with better UX and extra features.
Small but production-ready app or large feature implementation.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Wireframe or basic layout of 1 key screen.
1–2 static screens (e.g., welcome + simple info).
Multi-screen navigation (home + 1 feature) without backend.
App with simple local storage (shared prefs/SQLite) and input forms.
App with login, basic settings screen, and polished UI.
Stable app with error handling, basic analytics hooks, release APK.
Production-ready small app: release build, proguard config, publishing guidance.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: 1 UI mock or component preview.
Basic starter project + 1 screen.
2–3 screens with basic navigation.
API integration for 1–2 endpoints.
Offline storage (local DB) and improved UI.
Push notifications and basic theming.
Nearly full small app: multi-screen, backend integration, release build.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Quick code review or suggestion list.
1 small bug fix or UI tweak.
1 small feature (e.g., new form, simple screen).
Medium feature: pagination, search, filtering, or state improvement.
Performance improvements and several bug fixes together.
Major feature: new module/section with UI + logic.
Big refactor or multiple large features bundled.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Simple PoC (e.g., calling a speech API or basic VPN config preview).
Barebones UI shell with one active button/workflow.
Connecting front-end to one external API (test mode).
Stable single-feature utility app ready for early users.
Additional features like logs, history, or configurations.
Polish, extra security checks, and better UX.
Full small security/utility app: multi-feature, local storage, and release build.

sections.title: Cybersecurity & Pentesting Pricing
sections.description: VAPT, Network Security, and Security Consultation.

overview.desc: Light recon / quick check; no deep exploitation.
Simple scan or small config check.
Basic vulnerability scan with short notes.
Structured scan plus short report.
Deeper testing with remediation suggestions.
Small but serious pentest / VAPT with proof-of-concept.
Mini red-team style engagement or thorough test for 1 asset.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Basic external recon: open ports/services list snapshot.
Automated vulnerability scan output (no manual validation).
Verified list of key findings with short plain-text comments.
Structured PDF report with issues, risk levels, and basic remediation steps.
Manual testing on common OWASP issues (XSS, basic auth flaws, misconfigurations) + improved report.
Deeper testing, screenshots/PoCs for major findings, and prioritized fix plan.
One full cycle: test, report, consultation call, and one retest after fixes.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Basic static APK check or quick permissions review.
Automated scan report (e.g., manifest issues, debug flags).
Manual review of storage, logging, and simple API endpoints.
Combined static + light dynamic testing report.
Obfuscation / tampering attempts plus secure storage checks.
Detailed PDF with PoCs and prioritized fixes.
Comprehensive VAPT for single app version + one retest after fixes.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Simple Nmap-style scan of 1 IP range / server with service list.
Detailed scan with version detection and top ports.
Simple vulnerability mapping based on detected services.
Structured findings report with risk levels.
Manual verification of a subset of higher-risk findings.
Small internal-style assessment (where access is provided).
Mini engagement: recon, scan, manual tests, report, and short consultation.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: Quick check of router configuration screenshot / settings.
Recommendations on SSID, password strength, and basic router security.
Guidance on WPA2/WPA3 config and guest network setup.
Remote/onsite (if feasible) review of Wi‑Fi network with full settings audit.
Testing for weak passwords and obvious misconfigurations.
Simulated small attack scenarios, followed by secure configuration.
Full small-office Wi‑Fi review, documentation, and training on safe usage.

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: 15–30 minute Q&A or quick advice session (chat/voice).
30–45 minute basic security awareness session for individuals.
1–hour session with slides or live demo (beginners).
2–hour session: basics of safe browsing, passwords, and common scams.
Half-day workshop outline or multiple short sessions for a small team.
Structured mini-course over multiple days (e.g., 4 × 1-hour sessions).
1-week mini-bootcamp or custom curriculum for a small group (online).

tiers.name: Free Trial
tiers.details: High-level recommendation of tools and OS setup.
Basic guide to installing one security OS or toolkit.
Step-by-step documentation for your environment.
Remote assistance with installing and configuring key tools.
Customized scripts or small automation for routine tasks.
Full lab setup: VMs, tools, basic documentation.
Advanced lab with multiple machines, scenarios, and ongoing tuning support.

customWork.title: Custom Work
customWork.description: For any work that does not fit perfectly into a package.
points: Start with Free Trial (small audit, discussion, or PoC).
Cap most individual mini-projects at ₹9,999 unless clearly much larger.
